segments.text: What a great weekend that was !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really enjoy the beach in the summer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I couldn't agree with you more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We should come here more often .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to come back next weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's exactly the way I feel .
segments.speaker: S2
